content: this pattern is for an earwarmer/headband featuring the gorgeous alpine stitch this is medium/large to fit an adult head 23 circumference - the pattern can be adjusted as needed by altering the length of the foundation chain this pattern requires dk yarn in only one colourway and is suitable for a confident beginner **this pattern pdf includes ** - step-by-step written instructions in uk crochet terms - clear row-by-row guidance for the alpine stitch pattern - materials list and sizing guidance - helpful notes on stitch placement and gauge - a clean printer-friendly layout
